short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SmartPriceAlert tracks product prices and sends alert for price drops/ target price, saving you time and money while online shopping

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SmartPriceAlert is an extension that tracks prices of products and sends you alerts when the price drops or meets your target price. It works with major online retailers like Amazon, helping you save time and money while shopping online. Set price alerts for products you want to buy and get notified instantly of any price changes. With SmartPriceAlert, you can make informed purchasing decisions and stay on top of the best deals on products you love.
